text: Ferdinand Porsche (1875–1951) was an automotive engineer and founder of the Porsche car company. Ferdinand Porsche may also refer to: * Ferdinand Anton Ernst Porsche (1909–1998), known as Ferry, automobile designer and businessman, son of Ferdinand Porsche, Sr. * Ferdinand Alexander Porsche (1935–2012), nicknamed Butzi, automobile designer, creator of the Porsche 911, son of Ferry Porsche * Ferdinand Oliver Porsche (born 1961), German lawyer and businessman, son of Ferdinand Alexander Porsche == See also == * * * * * Porsche family * Ferdinand (disambiguation) * Porsche (disambiguation)
title: Ferdinand Porsche (disambiguation)
